"If it is the šnūman of the gāhānbār. : raϑβō bərəzatō yō aṣ̌ahe raϑβąm aiiaranąmca asniianąmca māhiianąmca yāiriianąmca sarəδanąmca raϑβąm vīspe mazištanąm yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanūm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmiie raϑβō (or he should say the corresponding gāh) xšnaōϑra yasnāica vahmāica xšnōϑrāica frasastaiiaēca If it is the šnūman for Srōš : sraōšahe aṣ̌iiehe taxmahe tanumąrahe darši.draōš ahūiriiehe xšnaōϑra up to the end. If it is the šnūman for Ardā Fraward : ahurahe mazdā̊ raēuuatō xᵛarənaŋhatō aməṣ̌anąm spəṇtanąm aṣ̌aōnąm frauuašinąm uγranąm aiβiϑūranąm paōiriiō.t̰kaēšanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm nabānazdištanąm frauuaṣ̌inąm xšnaōϑra yasnāica up to frasastaiiaēca."

Revāyat of Kāmdin Šapur (MU1, p. 447), on the Visperad ī Gahānbār:
(Pers.) bevāǧ gereftan con raϑβą̇m tamām ḫᵛānand pas raϑβō bərəzatō ẏō aṣ̌ahe raϑβą̇m aiiaraną̇mca asniianą̇mca māhīaną̇mca ẏāriianą̇mca sarəδaną̇mca raϑβą̇m vīspa mazištaną̇m ẏōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paitiratūm maidiiōi.zaramiie raϑβō xšnaoϑra ẏasnāica ke gahanbār midyošahm bāšad maidiiō.ṣ̌amahe raϑβō har gahanbār ke bāšad ān bāyad goftan con yašt āvāyad ḫᵛāndan tā hiiat̰ vasnā fraṣ̌nō (VrS0.12).
"At the taking of the wāz, after they recite completely raϑβą̇m then (they should recite) raϑβō bərəzatō ẏō aṣ̌ahe raϑβą̇m aiiaraną̇mca asniianą̇mca māhīaną̇mca ẏāriianą̇mca sarəδaną̇mca raϑβą̇m vīspa mazištaną̇m ẏōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paitiratūm maidiiōi.zaramiie raϑβō xšnaoϑra ẏasnāica. If it is during the gahānbār ī maiδiiōišəma, (he should recite) maidiiō.ṣ̌amahe raϑβō. At each gahānbār that should be, they should recite as it has to be recited in the Yasna until hiiat̰ vasnā fraṣ̌nō (VrS0.12)."
